author: Simon Difford
description: A refreshing Scotch and port wine nightcap, or perhaps a citrusy whisky aperitif. The Scotch and orange combo puts this drink in the same camp as the classic Blood & Sand.
name: Rosemary Tuck
recipeIngredient: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
